name: Pixel Beef Battle
detailed_description:
"This must be the ultimate Multiplayer Battle Mode Game out there"
-Random NPC from Pixel Beef Battle



Pixel Beef Battle is a modern couch-coop- and PvP multiplayer game inspired by classic Plattformers of the Super Nintendo Era. You play together or against each other, mastering the always increasing difficulty and unlocking new characters. Use your Skills and Power-Ups to beat as many enemies as possible and collect diamonds to level up.

Features:

-1-4 Player Couch Coop Multiplayer
-2-4 Player Couch PvP Multiplayer
-10 Unlockable Characters
-Level Result Statistics
-Playable Main Menu Evolves Over Play Time
-Soundtrack by Robert Kilpatrick


Note:
-Xbox Gamepad is necessary for Multiplayer Mode

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
